#include <bits/stdc++.h>
#include <algorithm>
using namespace std;

#define xx         first
#define yy         second
#define pb         push_back
#define mp         make_pair
#define LL         long long
#define mod        1000000007ll
#define PI         acos(-1.0)
#define EPS        1e-8
#define FOR(I,A,B) for(int I = (A); I < (B); ++I)
#define REP(I,N)   FOR(I,0,N)
#define ALL(A)     ((A).begin(), (A).end())
#define mem(ar,v)    memset(ar,v,sizeof ar)
#define vsort(v)   sort(v.begin(),v.end())
#define READ(f)    freopen(f,"r",stdin)
#define WRITE(f)   freopen(f,"w",stdout)

#define MAX 100005


int main(){
    int T,q=0;
    int a,b,c;
    vector <int>v;
    cin>>T;
    while(T--){
        q++;
        for(int i=0;i<3;i++){
            cin>>a;
            v.push_back(a);
        }
        vsort(v);
        printf("%d\n",v[1]);
        v.clear();
    }
}
